Class AbstractDomainModelDescriptor

All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
AnimalDomainModel, ContactsDomainModel, GambitDomainModel, HelpDeskDomainModel, LibraryDomainModel, RetailDomainModel, UserguideDomainModel
public abstract class AbstractDomainModelDescriptor extends Object implements DomainModelDescriptor
Convenience base class test domain models based on annotated classes
